markdownRemark.html: The virtual world we interact everyday is composed of codes created to communicate from to servers all around the world. The code of this blog is a great example to show how complicated things could be in the eyes of a machine trying to understand all the things that we teach it to do.. You can see the tech-stoic blog code through this link.
